headline: Is Autodesk (ADSK) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether Autodesk's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article walks through the key valuation angles to help you frame that question clearly. Autodesk recently closed at US$276.02, with returns of a 3.7% decline over the last 7 days, an 8.0% decline over 30 days, a 3.7% decline year to date, a 3.1% decline over 1 year, 37.6% over 3 years, and a 10.5% decline over 5 years. Recent coverage around Autodesk has focused on its role in software for...
